name: Twitch Soccer
description:
Description:

Players will work together to play as one collective goalie by typing commands into chat to try and let up the least amount of goals as possible.

How to Play:

Go to my personal Twitch chat: Nolski

Give me a follow if you like!

Type the words listed below to play

Commands: 

"Jump" - Makes the player jump

"Left" - Makes the player slide to the left

"Right" - Makes the player slide to the right

"Jump Left" - Makes the player jump to the left

"Jump Right" - Makes the player jump to the right

"Restart" - Resets the game once it has finished

Credits:

Programming - Nolan Sadowski

3D Models - Free assets courtesy of the Unity Asset Store

Sound FX - Free sounds courtesy of Freesound.org
